This is the Version of Half Life 2 A non steam version which can be Used to play Via LAN, Or start your own server, or play on an existing server There is a serverlist included

this Pack contains Hl2, ep1, ep2, then Synergy, Follow Freeman, Obsidian Conflit and LOOOOOOOOOOAds moore i cant really remember what now.. fut there are like 6 games in a nice loader menu, you have to Launch them from the BATCH loader or In the Installed directory there is a .bat file for all the games..
installeation method 
HOW TO RUN
1. HL2_CoopMode_Client_setup
2. HL2_CoopMode_ClientUpdate_setup
3. HL2_CoopMode_ClientUpdate_setup2
4. HL2_CoopMode Maps_setup

DO NOT RUN HL2_CoopMode Maps_setup BEFORE THE REST OR THE MAPS WILL GET OVERRRTTEN !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
thats it run and play hope i Made the torrent correct because this is the first time i post
